alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 3:27AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Doniphan, northeastern Atchison, northwestern Buchanan, southeastern Holt and southwestern Andrew Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highland, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Atchison, Wathena, Elwood, Highland, Troy, Denton, Doniphan, Severance, Leona, St. Joseph Airport, Bendena and Fanning. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 46 and 49. Interstate 229 between mile markers 3 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas...and northwestern Missouri.
